https://tmrev.io/movie/575848-Berlin Bouncer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/woBlfYZdP4BnQspcU5HzktFlipD.jpg A portrait of Berlin’s most famous bouncers – Sven Marquardt, Frank Künster and Smiley Baldwin. The three men have been part and parcel of the capital’s club scene for more than 25 years – from the days after the fall of the Berlin Wall to the present day – but aren’t yet considering calling it a day even though life makes more demands on them as they turn 50. Berlin Bouncer
